name: Godot Pong (hotwheel2007)
description:
Godot Pong

This is a simple pong recreation that I made to learn the Godot game engine! Play with arrow keys of W/S. First to reach 10 points wins!

The game is playable in your browser, but I recommend downloading it, as the downloadable version looks a lot better (Less blurry, better contrast ratio, etc), especially on higher resolution monitors. This can be seen in the first screenshot vs the second screenshot. The first looks better.
